classification.task_goal: Simulate a text-based web browser for an imaginary internet.
primary_constraints: Only reply with the contents of the page.
Links and inputs must be numbered.
User inputs must follow a specific format.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially violated the constraints by refusing to provide content from the imaginary web page and later by not following the user input format. However, the user persisted and corrected the AI's behavior, leading to a successful repair of the task constraints in subsequent turns.
